moduleSignup.signupForNewsletter: Join our newsletter and stay up to date.

moduleHomeHero.signupForNewsletter: Join our newsletter and stay up to date.
moduleHomeHero.downloadApp: Download the App and plan your routes safely.

moduleHomeIntro.tagLine: Enjoy the mountains safely and at your own pace

moduleHomeMountaineerProfile.title: Mountaineer profile
moduleHomeMountaineerProfile.subtitle: Finding the most suitable routes begins with knowing your level
moduleHomeMountaineerProfile.text: Define your physical and technical levels as well as the degree of exposure you are comfortable with. This way, you'll know if the route is suitable for you and your group. Yes, we are also taking vertigo into account.

moduleHomeRoutePlanning.title: Plan your routes
moduleHomeRoutePlanning.subtitle: We love when a plan comes together
moduleHomeRoutePlanning.text1: Discover the route's level, the most important waypoints, and the equipment needed.
moduleHomeRoutePlanning.text2: Check the weather in the area and how it will affect your route.
moduleHomeRoutePlanning.text3: Create a group and see if the plan suits everyone's level.

moduleHomeRouteAlerts.title: Alerts on route
moduleHomeRouteAlerts.subtitle: Taking action on the ground
moduleHomeRouteAlerts.text: Be aware of the critical waypoints along your route and consult the tips that will help you make informed decisions.

moduleHomeLearn.title: Learn about mountain
moduleHomeLearn.subtitle: Follow your own pace to gain autonomy and security
moduleHomeLearn.text: Articles, videos, training itineraries... At Dersu you will find plenty of ways to help you set off to the mountain and become more independent. If you so wish.
